abstract: The National League Championship Series is a battle between two Midwest rivals, the St. Louis Cardinals and the Milwaukee Brewers. And each has been propelled this postseason by the players who usually swing the biggest bats.
snippet: The National League Championship Series is a battle between two Midwest rivals, the St. Louis Cardinals and the Milwaukee Brewers. And each has been propelled this postseason by the players who usually swing the biggest bats.
lead_paragraph: The National League Championship Series is a battle between two Midwest rivals, the St. Louis Cardinals and the Milwaukee Brewers. And each has been propelled this postseason by the players who usually swing the biggest bats.

headline.main: Middle of the Country, Middle of the Order
